alert.note: Alert for DuPage; Lake; McHenry; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 3:16PM CST until January 17 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 to 40 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 to 30 below zero. Lowest wind chills will be at night and during the morning. * WHERE...McHenry, Lake IL, DuPage and Northern Cook Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon Tuesday to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
